医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
参议员要求社会保障局就与新冠救济相关的回扣问题作出答复负责监督社会保障的小组的三名美国参议员呼吁社会保障管理局对一篇新闻报道做出回应，该报道称，人们的福利因收到了新冠肺炎 (covid-19) 救济金而被减少或暂停，这违反了该机构的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Senators-demand-answers-from-Social-Security-on-clawbacks-tied-to-covid-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Senators-demand-answers-from-Social-Security-on-clawbacks-tied-to-covid-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83f4342b-e66c-4f5b-8a8b-1549a09e636f Thu, 19 Oct 2023 20:59:35 -0400 Senators demand answers from Social Security on clawbacks tied to covid relief
拜登当选美国国立卫生研究院院长终于迎来了她的日子，但仍陷入药品价格辩论参议院委员会最终于周三就总统乔·拜登挑选领导国立卫生研究院的问题举行了听证会。但该小组主席、佛蒙特州参议员伯尼·桑德斯 (Bernie Sanders) 将重点放在药品价格上，而美国国立卫生研究院对此几乎没有控制权。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Biden-pick-to-lead-NIH-finally-has-her-day-but-still-gets-caught-up-in-drug-price-辩论.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Biden-pick-to-lead-NIH-finally-has-her-day-but-still-gets-caught-up-in-drug-price-辩论.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a4e854c-397a-410f-9cea-a48ed5e87d21 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 20:56:17 -0400 Biden pick to lead NIH finally has her day, but still gets caught up in drug price debate
瘤内产生乳酸的细菌会导致对放射治疗的耐药性德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员发现，肿瘤内产生乳酸的细菌会导致对放射治疗的抵抗力，这表明存在于各种癌症中的产生乳酸的细菌可能作为新的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Lactate-having-intratumoral-bacteria-drive-resistance-to-radiation-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Lactate-having-intratumoral-bacteria-drive-resistance-to-radiation-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75287280-c710-4300-93bf-c65785795529 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:44:01 -0400 Lactate-producing intratumoral bacteria drive resistance to radiation therapy
“二合一”癌症免疫疗法更有效且至少与标准疗法一样安全来自 UPMC Hillman 癌症中心的医师科学家今天在《自然医学》杂志上领导了一份国际早期临床试验报告，“二合一”癌症免疫疗法可能更有效，至少与标准免疫疗法一样安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Two-for-one-cancer-immunotherapy-more- effective-and-at-least-as-safe-as-standard-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Two-for-one-cancer-immunotherapy-more- effective-and-at-least-as-safe-as-standard-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5d2c682-14de-422d-ab00-4d3e313d7a4e Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:38:46 -0400 "Two-for-one" cancer immunotherapy more effective and at least as safe as standard treatments
多发性骨髓瘤的 CAR T 细胞疗法显示，不同种族和民族的生存结果没有差异根据《Blood Advances》发表的一项研究，使用 idecabtagene vicleucel（称为“ide-cel”）（一种嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞疗法）治疗的多发性骨髓瘤患者，无论种族和民族如何，总体生存结果没有差异。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/CAR-T-cell-therapy-for-multiple-myeloma-shows-no-difference-in-survival-outcomes-by-race-and-ethnicity。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/CAR-T-cell-therapy-for-multiple-myeloma-shows-no-difference-in-survival-outcomes-by-race-and-ethnicity。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebddb5a8-99f1-4f32-9fd9-6965616f0308 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:17:40 -0400 CAR T-cell therapy for multiple myeloma shows no difference in survival outcomes by race and ethnicity
研究将两种新菌株添加到潜在的抗高血压益生菌列表中据估计，全球 40% 的成年人患有高血压，这使人们面临心血管疾病和其他危险健康状况的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-adds-two-new-strains-to-the-list-of-potential-antihypertential-probiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-adds-two-new-strains-to-the-list-of-potial-antihypertential-probiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6b62ea5-cf7d-4098-a866-17a2ee750f29 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:08:12 -0400 Study adds two new strains to the list of potential antihypertensive probiotics
研究揭示了 COVID-19 大流行对患有消化性溃疡病的老年人的心理健康造成的影响多伦多大学的新研究揭示了 COVID-19 大流行对患有消化性溃疡 (PUD) 的老年人造成的心理健康损害。PUD 是一种痛苦的疾病，胃溃疡发生在胃壁或胃上部。肠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Research-reveals-mental-health-toll-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-older-adults-with-peptic-ulcer-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Research-reveals-mental-health-toll-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-older-adults-with-peptic-ulcer-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70efc3a9-3a94-4f26-8b22-f6fd2c5d0168 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:03:13 -0400 Research reveals mental health toll of COVID-19 pandemic on older adults with peptic ulcer disease
研究发现血栓的遗传倾向与避孕药的使用之间存在密切联系根据乌普萨拉大学的一项新研究，具有高度血栓遗传倾向的女性在使用避孕药的头两年内出现血栓的可能性是其六倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-finds-strong-link- Between-genic-predisposition-for-blood-clots-and-contraceptive-pill-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-finds-strong-link- Between-genic-predisposition-for-blood-clots-and-contraceptive-pill-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30c53af0-0820-463d-b51d-c3eab42059a1 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 12:50:35 -0400 Study finds strong link between genetic predisposition for blood clots and contraceptive pill use
每周吃两份红肉可能会增加患 2 型糖尿病的风险哈佛大学陈曾熙学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，与吃较少份红肉的人相比，每周只吃两份红肉的人患 2 型糖尿病的风险可能会增加，而且随着食用量的增加，患 2 型糖尿病的风险也会增加公共卫生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Eating-two-servings-of-red-meat-per-week-may-raise-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Eating-two-servings-of-red-meat-per-week-may-raise-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6543ec30-43b5-4404-b155-5fb0ef57b9db Thu, 19 Oct 2023 12:29:51 -0400 Eating two servings of red meat per week may raise type 2 diabetes risk
研究人员描述了对抗抗生素耐药细菌的新药物组合抗生素耐药性——当病原体能够在抗生素治疗中存活下来时发生——是当今最迅速出现的全球公共卫生威胁之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Researchers-profile-new-drug-combinations-to-fight-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Researchers-profile-new-drug-combinations-to-fight-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e000311-a66f-4ce4-9f33-5cc2b2284e2c Thu, 19 Oct 2023 12:21:51 -0400 Researchers profile new drug combinations to fight antibiotic-resistant bacteria
